room_title: Escape room "Ghost Tavern" by Cracked Escape in Akron
review: We had a fantastic time with a group of 6 escaping the Ghost Tavern room! This was our first time in an escape room. We didn't know what to expect, and were just hoping for a fun time. It was beyond what we could have imagined as far as fun! The puzzle was tricky, but with enough silliness to keep it from being too frustrating. The "set" was perfect, wonderful details that kept us in an old west frame of mind the whole time.

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Tavern" by Cracked Escape in Akron
review: First escape room Iâ€™ve done, what an awesome experience. Completed the Ghost Tavern room w/ 6 people. Decor was great, puzzles were really challenging, and the immersion was really cool. Staff was super friendly and helpful for a group of first timers. Definitely will be coming back to do the other rooms in the future! Thanks!

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Tavern" by Cracked Escape in Akron
review: First experience doing an escape room and it was awesome! So much fun and a great puzzle to solve. Highly recommend. We did the ghost tavern.

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Tavern" by Cracked Escape in Akron
review: We had so much fun. Everything was organized and the staff was nice and fun. We did the Tavern room and I wish we could have went straight back in to do the other one. Thanks for a fun night!

room_title: Escape room "Ghost Tavern" by Cracked Escape in Akron
review: Had a blast in the Ghost Room. Will definitely be back.
